extendedInfo.description: This Utility App locks screen to GUARD from accidentally hanging up phone when cheek touches the screen. Press back button to unlock.NO ADS, NO HANG UPS, GET THE FIX!

reviews.comment: Excellent!!! One great idea is to make the screen transparent while calling so that we can see our call duration and thereby decide to hang up the call fast. It would help us to hang up our call when we have low available balance for calling. Great applet!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hang free
reviews.comment: When i enable cheekey it create my phone faster gr8 app.
reviews.author: Md.sohail Khan

reviews.title: Works as advertised!
reviews.comment: My phone used to discover duetting call after few seconds. I used to think it was a hardware or related issue. Turns out that it was my cheek doing cheeky things which this simple app took care of.
reviews.author: Saurabh Kumar

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: No more hang ups
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & Sweet! :-)
reviews.comment: This app is a must have. I emailed the developer about creating a way to enable the screen lock again after you\'re finished using the dial pad, & he created a solution in less than 48 hours. That\'s what I call great customer service. Thanks for listening!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent! The only working app for my phone.
reviews.comment: Tried several paid and free applications to lock my screen during the call. This one is the only that works on my phone with no problems. Very useful!
reviews.author: Maria Aleksieva

reviews.title: First class app
reviews.comment: Wow a first class that does what it says. I been looking for a good working app. Its working great on my Sony xperia t thank you very much
reviews.author: shawn adams

reviews.title: Smart solutiom
reviews.comment: Great for spotty proximity sensor performance on calls
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Screen remains off
reviews.comment: Phone needs restart.  DHD
reviews.author: Giorgos CHS

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Does what it says...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: It still hangs up calls on my Motorola XPRT. Also, I can\'t see or access calls when another call comes in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost...
reviews.comment: But not quite...  a cheek hang up preventer needs to block access to the call End key while against face; but allow access to all keys when not in proximity. Could not access dial pad and unblocking defeats purpose of this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good job
reviews.comment: force-lock is better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: This is a must have app! I can\'t tell you how many times my face has hung up on people with my huge EVO screen. It just prevented me from doing it too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cheekey is Great!!!!!
reviews.comment: Excellent. Eliminates accidentally hanging up on call.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cheekey
reviews.comment: By far the best app of its kind. Works consistently each and every time. Love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: That\'s what is supposed to do.  Motorola ATRIX . Slide bar unlock would make it a five star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LG Optimus Q
reviews.comment: Great! Does what it\'s supposed to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best App ever
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I was looking for!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you was ready to replace my phone
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User
